body.p: The Abstracts application gathers content for publication or subject matter for an event or session. The staff user sets the criteria for an Abstract Call and opens it up for submission. A submitter creates an entry. The submission then undergoes a review (open, blind or double-blind) to determine whether it meets the defined criteria of the Abstract Call. The staff user assigns the submission to the reviewer for review. To participate in the Abstract Call, both submitters and reviewers must have Contact records.
Approved submissions are then related to the event, session or publication item.
